SVGTestCase.desc: Test the simple operation of the EventTarget interface methods

d:OperatorScript.p: This tests that the methods of the EventTarget interface work correctly.
There are three sub-tests (a rectangle for each). These are:

ul.li: Sub-test 1: test adding a listener with addEventListener.
Sub-test 2: test adding a listener with addEventListener then removing it with removeEventListener.
Sub-test 3: test adding a listener for an event type with incorrect casing.

d:OperatorScript.p: The test has been passed if all three rectangles are blue.

g.text: All three rectangles must be blue.
